mapper.insert: insert into member (id, username, birth_date, password, gender, u_tel, email, created_at, user_type, nickname, u_address, diary_private, warning_count, state_code) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{birthDate}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{uTel}, #{email}, NOW() , 'USER' , #{nickname}, #{uAddress}, #{diaryPrivate}, 0, 1)
mapper.select: select id as userId, username as userName, user_type as userType from member where email = #{email}
select * from member where id = #{userId} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select password from member where id = #{userId}
select u_no as userNo, password from member where id = #{userId}
select nickname, u_no from member where u_no = #{u_no}

SELECT m.u_no, m.id, m.username, m.nickname, m.u_address, m.email, m.u_tel, m.gender, m.diary_private, f.file_no, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_category FROM member m LEFT JOIN file f ON m.u_no = f.u_no AND f.file_part = 'profile' WHERE m.u_no = #{uNo}
select id from member where u_no = #{uNo}
